articles.author: Hormaz Fatakia
articles.title: Trade Setup For Jan 5: Can a rangebound Nifty end this volatile week higher? - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Nifty needs to close above the 21,734 mark to ensure that the first week of the new year does not end on a negative note.
